Class Post

java.lang.Object
  Post
Direct Known Subclasses:
MessagePost, PhotoPost
public class Post
extends Object

This class stores information about a news feed post in a social network. Posts can be stored and displayed. This class serves as a superclass for more specific post types.

Version:
0.2
Author:
Michael KÃ¶lling and David J. Barnes

Method Detail

addComment

public void addComment(String text)
Add a comment to this post.

Parameters:
text - The new comment to add.

display

public void display()
Display the details of this post. (Currently: Print to the text terminal. This is simulating display in a web browser for now.)

getTimeStamp

public long getTimeStamp()
Return the time of creation of this post.

Returns:
The post's creation time, as a system time value.

like

public void like()
Record one more 'Like' indication from a user.

unlike

public void unlike()
Record that a user has withdrawn his/her 'Like' vote.
